Notes: Required - User's current condition: 'fine', 'shaken', 'minor_pain', 'significant_pain', or 'emergency' - Triggers conditional alerts
JavaScript-generated timestamp when page was completed (new Date().toISOString()) - Stored in sessionStorage
Merged data from all 12 pages (incident_page1 through incident_page12 + incident_form_data) - Stored in sessionStorage for transcription page submission
